extendedInfo.description: ** Written for the revised NEW PMBOK 5th exam version per 31 July 2013 **Oliver F. Lehmann's PMPÂ® Exam prep app coaches you for the PMPÂ® (Project Management Professional) examination, offered by PMIÂ®.  The PMPÂ® credential is the most important and most widely accepted project management certification with a fast growing number of credential holders (over 530,000 by 30 April 2013). The test is hard to pass and candidates should be perfectly prepared for it.The set of questions, answers, and explanations has been selected and prepared by Oliver F. Lehmann, PMP, a reference in the project management domain; professional trainer since 1995 and President of the PMIÂ® Munich Chapter in Germany. He has successfully conducted trainings for companies such as Oracle, Siemens, IBM, Hewlett Packard, SAP and many others.This app will test your preparation level, by offering more than 550 complex questions in an exam-like simulation based on the PMBOKÂ® Guide NEW 5th Edition. After completing the exam simulation , detailed feedback and pass mark are given. Alternatively, in tutorial  mode the application will provide you with comprehensive explanations of the correct answers and references after each question.This app will give you:- over 550 realistic examination questions (more than 10 hours of exam time)- an important benchmark for your exam-readiness- explanations for each question- a tutorial mode allowing you to steadily increase your knowledgeThis exam simulator will certainly help you improve your preparation level and identify gaps in every knowledge area and process group. It has been written for the revised exam version per 31 July 2013.PMI, PMP and PMBOKÂ® Guide are marks of PMI, the Project Management Institute, that are registered in the USA and in other countries.

reviews.title: Good questions, wrong answers
reviews.comment: Several wrong answers, especially with evm. ETC = estimate at completion (EAC) \342\200\223 actual costs (AC) not bac-ac.
reviews.author: Rock Stevens

reviews.title: Awesome team!
reviews.comment: I had a prob with the app not recognising the paid license. I got a response from the app developer within an hour and got it aorted out. Superb support!
reviews.author: Tamsyn Kent

reviews.comment: This program has too many mistakes.   Be carefull about some of the answers.  They are categorized as correct but are not.\tToo many mistakes and not  structured well.   Users cannot book mark where they pause for a long break and are forced to start from the beginning if there\'s data service intruption.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great practice questions.
reviews.comment: Nice handy app for PMP exam.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent-worth every penny!
reviews.comment: Easy to use and relieved to have study materials created by highly qualified PMP experts certified by PMI with up-to-date content that is written so well - priceless!
reviews.author: A Google User
